title: The Foundations of Gentry Culture, c. 1270- c.1370
abstractText: This project has resulted in a book entitles The Foundations of Gentry Culture c. 1270-c. 1370, which provides a new socio-cultural basis for subsequent gentry studies. It will lead on to a further volume on the theme of cultural diffusion and dissemination and will help to facilitate my on-going comparative study of the English gentry and the Tuscan nobility.
